key.name: start-column
key.description: Column to start in. Valid values are from 0 to the configured maximum number of columns.

key.name: columns
key.description: Column to span. Valid values are from 1 to the configured maximum number of columns minus start-column.

key.name: height
key.description: Height in rows. This is multiplied by the configured row height to determine the height of the tile.

key.name: title
key.description: Tile title. This is shown on the tile if it exists.

key.name: type
key.description: Tile configuration. This is provided as a dictionary.
